name: Solubond: In Tandem
description:
At wit's end, an individual of unknown origins must finish their final concoction. However, to their dismay, every ingredient added struggles to mix with the rest. Could their chemical compounds really be insoluble? Now, when everything is on the line?

 Help them balance their mixture and merge the two substances by controlling two co-joined agents and connecting nodes, effectively causing the individual to remember the good days of Chemistry 101. 

Please sit back and enjoy Solubond: In Tandem! It is a short experience that should not take more than a few minutes.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys + Mouse (Menu Only)

A game by: LancerAlter (Me) & Joeske (https://joeske.itch.io/)

Credits:

Scripting/Coding/Implementation: Joeske

Level Design/Ideation: Joeske and LancerAlter

Visual Assets/Particle Effects/Storyboarding/Transitions: LancerAlter

Music:

  • Drops of H2O ( The Filtered Water Treatment ) by J.Lang (c) copyright 2012 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/djlang59/37792 Ft: Airtone
  • Background Noise by kvgarlic. (https://freesound.org/people/kvgarlic/sounds/321903/)

Sound Effects:

  • Mixed Samples: Click by NenadSimic (https://freesound.org/people/NenadSimic/sounds/171697/_
  • Bubbles Long 2 by belanhud (https://freesound.org/people/belanhud/sounds/537895/)

Font:

  • Apostrophic Labs at https://www.1001fonts.com/wellbutrin-font.html (Free and Commercial Use)

**All of the visual assets were made by our group for the purpose of this jam. 

*** None of the sound effects or music tracks were produced by our group.
